attributes.action: Lying In Parliament Should Be A Criminal Offence
attributes.additional_details:
LYING TO PARLIAMENT SHOULD BE MADE A CRIMINAL OFFENCE
Under Parliamentary “convention” A member is not allowed to call another member a Liar. At the same time Ministers Lie to Parliament On   A Regular Basis
Accordingly we the undersigned call for the scraping of the aforementioned convention and for Lying in the course of parliamentary proceedings to be made a criminal offence equivalent to perjury

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for HM Government
